alert.note: Alert for Bennett; Jackson (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 28 at 5:28PM MDT until May 28 at 6:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... South central Jackson County in southwestern South Dakota... Northwestern Bennett County in southwestern South Dakota... * Until 630 PM MDT. * At 528 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 5 miles west of LaCreek North Housing, or 5 miles northwest of Martin, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hisle, Eagle Nest Butte and Long Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
